title: Segmentation fault running all.bash (cmd/go)
body:
by **jnwhiteh**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Run ./all.bash

What is the expected output?

Go successfully compiles

What do you see instead?

./make.bash: line 141: 12595 Segmentation fault      "$GOTOOLDIR"/go_bootstrap
clean -i std

Which operating system are you using?

Debian 7.1, Linux wowforge.com 2.6.26-linode13

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

changeset:   17134:04e8a421933f
tag:         tip
user:        Dmitriy Vyukov <dvyukov@google.com>
date:        Mon Jun 24 23:51:00 2013 +0400
summary:     runtime/pprof: disable testing under race detector

Please provide any additional information below.

Attached is the build log. Please let me know if I can provide any further information
